Title: European gas prices surge to a fresh high on lower Russian pipeline imports
Description: European gas prices rose to a new high on Tuesday in response to lower pipeline imports from Russia. The TTF front-month contract hit an intra-day high of €174.99/MWh at 12.36pm GMT, equivalent to $58/MMBtu or $320/bbl. This is up 19% from Monday’s closing price of €146.93/MWh
